system.description:
The character has achieved a doctorate in medicine from one of the medical schools of Europe (Salerno, Cremona, Montpellier, or Bologna), and completed his two yearsâ€™ compulsory teaching. This Virtue offers the same benefits as

Doctor in (Faculty). This Virtue is compatible with the Hermetic Magus, and Priest Virtues. Note that this Virtue is available to female characters, although they must have graduated from Salerno; male characters may have graduated from any of the medical schools.
